EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

 

 

 

Dear Yogesh,

 

 

 

We would like to kindly request an update on the status of the claim for the total loss of vehicle C-41776, which was impacted by the hailstorm in Al Ain last February 2024.

 

Additionally, could you please advise on who will be responsible for processing the buyer and seller possession certificate?

 

This vehicle's registration needs to be removed under Real Emirates so we can proceed with registering our other vehicles.

 

 

 

 

Best regards,  

RONALD CANO​​​​

COORDINATOR ‑ LAST MILE

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

We would like to kindly request an update on the status of the claim for the total loss of vehicle C-41776, which was impacted by the hailstorm in Al Ain last February 2024.

 

Additionally, could you please advise on who will be responsible for processing the buyer and seller possession certificate?

Dear Yogesh,

 

 

 

We would like to kindly request an update on the status of the claim for the total loss of vehicle C-41776, which was impacted by the hailstorm in Al Ain last February 2024.

 

Additionally, could you please advise on who will be responsible for processing the buyer and seller possession certificate?

 

This vehicle's registration needs to be removed under Real Emirates so we can proceed with registering our other vehicles.

 

 

 

 

Best regards,  

RONALD CANO​​​​

Dear Yogesh,

 

 

 

We would like to kindly request an update on the status of the claim for the total loss of vehicle C-41776, which was impacted by the hailstorm in Al Ain last February 2024.

 

Additionally, could you please advise on who will be responsible for processing the buyer and seller possession certificate?

 

This vehicle's registration needs to be removed under Real Emirates so we can proceed with registering our other vehicles.

 

 

 

 

Best regards,  

RONALD CANO​​​​
